results.overview: The Earth is being invaded by aliens. Fortunately, the aliens are so concerned about budgets and the cost of the invasion that they haven't succeeded yet. To defend the Earth, Dr Kishida has designed ARIEL, a giant robot shaped in the likeness of a woman with body-armor. Unfortunately, he has selected his relatives (his grand-daughters Aya and Kazumi Kishida, and his niece Mia Kawai) to be the pilots, and they are far more interested in their own lives.
results.title: ARIEL: All Round Intercept & Escort Lady

results.overview: A boy (Billy Mauch) and his gang catch bank robbers using their clubhouse as a hide-out.
results.title: Penrod and Sam

results.overview: Fozzie Bear surprises his mother on Christmas Eve by bringing the entire Muppet gang to her farm to celebrate the holidays. Doc and his dog Sprocket, who had planned a quiet Christmas, end up joining the Muppets in their holiday activities and preparations. The Sesame Street and Fraggle Rock regulars join the festivities, but to Kermit's dismay, the only one missing is Miss Piggy, who has been caught in a snowstorm.
results.title: A Muppet Family Christmas

results.original_title: How to Capture a Prime Minister
results.overview: When a student protest erupts into violence, Prime Minister Malcolm Fraser seeks refuge in the bowels of a lecture theatre while his minders desperately hatch an escape plan.
results.title: How to Capture a Prime Minister

results.overview: Esposito is a thief who cons tourists in Rome. Officer Bottoni manages to catch him and starts persecuting him. When Esposito manages to flee, Bottoni's superiors inform him that he'll lose his job if he can't catch Esposito.
results.title: Cops and Robbers

results.original_title: An Alan Smithee Film: Burn, Hollywood, Burn
results.overview: Filmmaker Alan Smithee finds himself the unwilling puppet of a potentially bad big budget action film, for which he proceeds to steal the reels, and leaves the cast and crew in a frenzy.
results.title: An Alan Smithee Film: Burn, Hollywood, Burn

results.overview: The evil scientist Dr. Caronte plots to revive the brains of three dead scientists and use them to obtain the formula for the super-powerful neutron bomb. The resulting creation needs blood lots of blood, sending Caronte's midget assistant Nick and his legion of mutant monsters out to get fresh victims. However, the masked atom-superman Neutron vows to put a stop to Caronte's deeds.
results.title: Neutron the Atomic Superman vs. the Death Robots

results.original_title: ネット版 仮面ライダーオーズ ALLSTARS 21の主役とコアメダル
results.overview: A series of net movies that were released by Toei to promote the Kamen Rider OOO summer movie, "Kamen Rider OOO Wonderful: The Shogun and the 21 Core Medals".
results.title: Kamen Rider OOO All Stars: The 21 Leading Actors and Core Medals

results.overview: When Santa crash-lands in the junkyard on Christmas Eve, Hank, Trash Truck and their animal friends all have a hand in rescuing the holiday for everyone.
results.title: A Trash Truck Christmas

results.overview: St. Petersburg, early 20th century. The handsome and secretive Johann specializes in shooting erotic pictures depicting the floggings of bare-bottomed women. With the help of his assistants, the photographic creations gradually penetrate the peaceful households of two upper-class Russian families.
results.title: Of Freaks and Men

results.overview: Following the roguish terrorist attacks at Uri Army Base camp in Kashmir, India takes the fight to the enemy, in its most successful covert operation till date with one and only one objective of avenging their fallen heroes.
results.title: Uri: The Surgical Strike

results.original_title: Cheryl Cole - A Million Lights: Live at The O2
results.overview: Cheryl Cole's performance at the O2 in London is the highlight of her first solo tour ever. Featuring spectacular concert footage, all of her hits, amazing dancers, special effects and guest appearances from Will.i.am and Wretch 32, this is Cheryl at the top of her game as one of the UK's most popular artists.
results.title: Cheryl Cole - A Million Lights: Live at The O2

results.overview: Two years after escaping from demonic terror, a young woman is still haunted by unnatural vision. The dangers that await her and her friends are increasingly threatening.
results.title: May the Devil Take You Too

results.overview: Using every known means of transportation, several savants from the Geographic Society undertake a journey through the Alps to the Sun which finishes under the sea.
results.title: The Impossible Voyage

results.original_title: The Legacy of a Whitetail Deer Hunter
results.overview: A star of hunting videos strives to bond with his 12-year-old son on a wilderness trip but learns familial connections can't be forced.
results.title: The Legacy of a Whitetail Deer Hunter

results.overview: After a car accident in which his mother dies, Antoine Chapelote decides to change his life and become a con-artist. He meets a young girl Caroline who helps him with his scam.
results.title: The Apprentice Heel

results.overview: A young adult embarks on an odyssey between the corridors of depression and negativism after the loss of a loved one.
results.title: Melodies of a Mute Life

results.overview: This documentary gathers information about the secret activities of a group of high command of the Mexican army; establishes the relationship of these with US intelligence agencies and discovers the route of terrorist actions during the student movement.
results.title: 1968: The American Connection

results.overview: Qi Ming is a handsome boy and he is also a top student at school, but Yi Yao is a so-called bitch on everyone’s lips. Qi and Yi grew up together and they have been maintaining a good relationship. However, everything is interrupted and changed by Tang Xiaomi. Rumors have become a sharp weapon to destroy people. Yi Yao's life falls into darkness, and she suffers all kinds of cruel bullying at school.
results.title: Cry Me a Sad River

results.overview: A serial murderer has brutally killed several policemen and their pregnant wives. After a quick investigation, the murderer is revealed to be Kit, whom the case's detective-in-charge knows from a previous case. Once upon a time, Kit was an innocent boy in a rural village who also has a crush on naïve high school student Wing. After the death of Wing's grandmother, Kit rescues Wing from a foster care facility, and the two quickly fall in love. However, their romance ends prematurely when a local policeman arrests them. The events that follow lay the seeds for Kit's terrifying path to vengeance.
results.title: Revenge: A Love Story
